summary: This is an email chain from September 2021, forwarding earlier communications about Epstein/Maxwell discovery and a reference to a victims meeting possibly covered by Glamour magazine. It shows internal FBI communication regarding victim services and discovery materials.

events.title: Forwarded email about Glamour inquiry
events.description: An email from October 25, 2019 was forwarded on October 25, 2020, referencing questions about a victims meeting by Glamour magazine.

events.title: Internal FBI email about Epstein/Maxwell discovery
events.description: Internal FBI email communication regarding Epstein/Maxwell discovery materials and victim services.

keyFacts: The document shows internal FBI communication about Epstein/Maxwell discovery materials.
There is reference to a victims meeting that may have been covered by Glamour magazine.
The email chain spans from October 2019 to September 2021, showing ongoing communication about the case.
The FBI Victim Services Division was involved in managing victim-related aspects of the Epstein/Maxwell case.
